Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes municipalities to adopt a sales tax exemption for clothing and footwear after March first, two thousand twenty-five
Summary: Authorizes municipalities to adopt a local law, ordinance or resolution providing for a sales tax exemption for clothing and footwear after March 1, 2025 and no later than August 1, 2025; provides for the repeal of such provisions on January 1, 2026.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing municipalities to adopt a sales tax exemption for clothing and footwear after March first; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
